item.title: [sis] Galvanic Juggernaut
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Juggernaut

Galvanic Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.

Galvanic Juggernaut doesn't untap during your untap step.

Whenever another creature dies, untap Galvanic Juggernaut.

item.title: [sis] Forge Devil
item.description:
Creature — Devil

When Forge Devil enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to you.

item.title: [sis] Forbidden Alchemy
item.description:
Instant

Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Fiend Hunter
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.

When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

item.title: [sis] Feeling of Dread
item.description:
Instant

Tap up to two target creatures.

Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Falkenrath Noble
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Noble

Flying

Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [sis] Falkenrath Aristocrat
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Noble

Flying, haste

Sacrifice a creature: Falkenrath Aristocrat gains indestructible until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on Falkenrath Aristocrat.

item.title: [sis] Faithless Looting
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Evolving Wilds
item.description:
Land

{T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [sis] Elder Cathar
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Elder Cathar dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature is a Human, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.

item.title: [sis] Drogskol Captain
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Soldier

Flying

Other Spirit creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.title: [sis] Doomed Traveler
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [sis] Divine Reckoning
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player chooses a creature they control. Destroy the rest.

Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Diregraf Captain
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Soldier

Deathtouch

Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [sis] Devil's Play
item.description:
Sorcery

Devil's Play deals X damage to any target.

Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Demonmail Hauberk
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +4/+2.

Equip—Sacrifice a creature.

item.title: [sis] Cackling Counterpart
item.description:
Instant

Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.

Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Butcher's Cleaver
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+0.

As long as equipped creature is a Human, it has lifelink.

Equip {3}

item.title: [sis] Bump in the Night
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent loses 3 life.

Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Brimstone Volley
item.description:
Instant

Brimstone Volley deals 3 damage to any target.

Morbid — Brimstone Volley deals 5 damage instead if a creature died this turn.

item.title: [sis] Bonds of Faith
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.

item.title: [sis] Bloodflow Connoisseur
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.

item.title: [sis] Blazing Torch
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature can't be blocked by Vampires or Zombies.

Equipped creature has "{T}, Sacrifice Blazing Torch: Blazing Torch deals 2 damage to any target."

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [sis] Battleground Geist
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Other Spirit creatures you control get +1/+0.

item.title: [sis] Barter in Blood
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player sacrifices two creatures.

item.title: [sis] Balefire Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Balefire Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to each creature that player controls.

item.title: [sis] Avacyn's Pilgrim
item.description:
Creature — Human Monk

{T}: Add {W}.

item.title: [sis] Avacyn's Collar
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has vigilance.

Whenever equipped creature dies, if it was a Human, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

Equip {2}

item.title: [sis] Avacyn, Angel of Hope
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel

Flying, vigilance, indestructible

Other permanents you control have indestructible.

item.title: [sis] Angel of Flight Alabaster
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

At the beginning of your upkeep, return target Spirit card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [ltr] Frodo, Sauron's Bane
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Citizen

{W/B}{W/B}: If Frodo, Sauron's Bane is a Citizen, it becomes a Halfling Scout with base power and toughness 2/3 and lifelink.

{B}{B}{B}: If Frodo is a Scout, it becomes a Halfling Rogue with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game if the Ring has tempted you four or more times this game. Otherwise, the Ring tempts you."

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Samwise the Stouthearted
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Peasant

Flash

When Samwise the Stouthearted enters the battlefield, choose up to one target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand. Then the Ring tempts you.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Gollum, Patient Plotter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Halfling Horror

When Gollum, Patient Plotter leaves the battlefield, the Ring tempts you.

{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Gollumn from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Mount Doom
item.description:
Legendary Land

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B} or {R}.

{1}{B}{R}, {T}: Mount Doom deals 1 damage to each opponent.

{5}{B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Mount Doom and a legendary artifact: Choose up to two creatures, then destroy the rest. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] You Cannot Pass!
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature that blocked or was blocked by a legendary creature this turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Reprieve
item.description:
Instant

Return target spell to its owner's hand.

Draw a card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Tom Bombadil
item.description:
Legendary Creature — God Bard

As long as there are four or more lore counters among Sagas you control, Tom Bombadil has hexproof and indestructible.

Whenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Saga card. Put that onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. This ability triggers only once each turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

item.title: [ltc] Sol Ring
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

item.title: [ltc] The Great Henge
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

{T}: Add {G}{G}. You gain 2 life.

Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on it and draw a card.

item.title: [ltc] Ensnaring Bridge
item.description:
Artifact

Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

https://twitter.com/kanister_mtg/status/1286249167833178113

item.title: [ltc] Wasteland
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

{T}: Add {G}{G}. You gain 2 life.

Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on it and draw a card.

item.title: [ltr] Trailblazer's Boots
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)

Equip {2}

item.title: [ltr] Aragorn and Arwen, Wed
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Elf Noble

Vigilance

Whenever Aragorn and Arwen, Wed enters the battlefield or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. You gain 1 life for each other creature you control.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth

item.title: [ltr] Sauron, the Lidless Eye
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Avatar Horror

When Sauron, the Lidless Eye enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

{1}{B}{R}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Each opponent loses 2 life.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/a-first-look-at-the-lord-of-the-rings-tales-of-middle-earth
